sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about', templateUrl: './about.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about.component.css'] }) export class AboutComponent { }

About


Valley View Estates is southern Saskatchewan's newest acreage size sub-division located in the beautiful Qu'Appelle Valley.


Only 22 miles from Regina, 2 miles west of craven on paved highway. 1 mile from Last Mountain Lare.


Download Information Package


  1. Lot sizes from 2 - 19 acres (horses allowed)
  2. Peaceful and tranquil living
  3. Safe environment where children and grandchildren can run and play
  4. Enjoy nature at it's best, abundance of wild life
  5. Beautiful views of valley
  6. Groomed walking/hiking trail through scenic 1/2 mile ravine
  7. 2 mile horse riding trail around subdivision
  8. Planned 4.5 acre playground and park
